body: When leading Chinese P2P website VeryCD was shut down in 2009, it was back online the next day. This time, it appears the network won't be back up until all copyrighted materials are removed: 'The days of "free" movie downloads for Chinese users,' writes [zh] tech blogger William Long, 'are over.'
original_body: When leading Chinese P2P website VeryCD was shut down in 2009, it was back online the next day. This time, it appears the network won't be back up until all copyrighted materials are removed: 'The days of "free" movie downloads for Chinese users,' writes [zh] tech blogger William Long, 'are over.'
title: China: P2P service down for copyright compliance
